name: Mommy Luma
lore: The astral matron who guides initiates through soft humiliation and tender discipline.

evolutionTree.name: Novice Form
evolutionTree.description: A gentle aura that steadies lucidity and guides first obedience rites.

evolutionTree.name: Ritual Form
evolutionTree.description: Channels temple chants into obedience surges during moonlit ceremonies.

evolutionTree.name: Divine Form
evolutionTree.description: Cascades dreamlight across the sanctum, sharpening every lucid recall.

name: Ekram
lore: Shamebound enforcer of the Panty Realm. Evolves through obedience forfeits.

evolutionTree.name: Watcher
evolutionTree.description: Keeps quiet tally of shame tokens and whispers reminders to submit.

evolutionTree.name: Panty Guardian
evolutionTree.description: Forges a radiant shame barrier, amplifying obedience each time panties are surrendered.
